ttp_template:
<group name="destination_address_destination_port_type_vlan_id">
b8d6-f6ff-7390 {{VLAN_ID | re("\\d+")}}/-/-  {{DESTINATION_PORT}}  {{TYPE | ORPHRASE}}
{{DESTINATION_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}} 10/-/-  XGE0/0/1  dynamic
</group>
textfsm_template:
Value DESTINATION_ADDRESS ([0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4})
Value DESTINATION_PORT ([^,\s]+)
Value TYPE (\S+)
Value VLAN_ID (\d+)

Start
  ^-+$$
  ^\s+$$
  ^MAC\s+Address
  ^${DESTINATION_ADDRESS}\s+${VLAN_ID}/([^/]+)/([^/]+)\s+${DESTINATION_PORT}\s+${TYPE} -> Record
  ^Total\s+items
  ^. -> Error
